sense.def:
Kadar ena stvar
surrounds another
, je vse naokoli druge stvari.

seg.quote: Muscles surround blood vessels in the body.
The house was surrounded by high walls.

sense.def:
Kadar ljudje
surround a person or place
, se postavijo okrog in okrog neke osebe ali kraja.

seg.quote: Don't get near him. Just surround him and keep him there.

sense.def:
Kadar težave ali nevarnosti
surround something
, so povezane s tistim.

seg.quote: ...the uncertainty surrounding the future of the railways.

sense.def:
To surround oneself with things
pomeni poskrbeti, da je v naši bližini ves čas veliko določenih stvari.

seg.quote: Get involved in social activities and surround yourself with friends.
